TopicTitle: Bug: "Offset" gizmo appearing in the environment

Articles.Content:
I saw a glitch while i was doing EVA on Kerbin.

The "Offset" gizmo that is used to move rocket/aircraft parts was appearing out of nowhere as I climbed towards the peak of mount valentina.

The BUG:

https://ibb.co/LPHSsSR

And the peak of mount valentina:

https://ibb.co/kGqH77h
